original_text: Then Jesus looked up and saw something that was happening in the temple. There was a box for money there. Many rich people were putting their gifts of money into the box.
korean_text: 예수께서 눈을 들어 부자들이 헌금함에 헌금 넣는 것을 보시고

sentences.original_text: and saw something that was happening in the temple
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 성전에서 일어나고 있는 일을 보셨다

sentences.original_text: There was a box for money there
Many rich people were putting their gifts of money into the box
sentences.korean_translation: 많은 부자들이 그들의 헌금을 상자에 넣고 있었다
